quotes.message: Frustration is the compost from which the mushrooms of creativity grow.
quotes.name: Tumerica

quotes.message: Frustration is commonly the difference between what you would like to be and what you are willing to sacrifice to become what you would like to be.
quotes.name: unknown

quotes.message: Consider how hard it is to change yourself and you'll understand what little chance you have in trying to change others.
quotes.name: Tom Robbins

quotes.message: Our frustration is greater when we have much and want more than when we have nothing and want some. We are less dissatisfied when we lack many things than when we seem to lack but one thing.
quotes.name: Eric Hoffer

quotes.message: No matter how discouraged we get, God has not asked us to do the impossible.
quotes.name: George Grace

quotes.message: I have had just about all I can take of myself.
quotes.name: S. N. Behrman

quotes.message: You throw the sand against the wind; And the wind blows it back again.
quotes.name: William Blake

quotes.message: When you are angry or frustrated, what comes out? Whatever it is, it's a good indication of what you're made of.
quotes.name: H. Jackson Brown

quotes.message: In times of great stress or adversity, it's always best to keep busy, to plow your anger and your energy into something positive.
quotes.name: Lee Iacocca

quotes.message: Laughter and tears are both responses to frustration and exhaustion . . . . I myself prefer to laugh, since there is less cleaning up to do afterward.
quotes.name: Kurt Vonnegut

quotes.message: I've come to believe that all my past failure and frustration were actually laying the foundation for the understandings that have created the new level of living I now enjoy.
quotes.name: Anthony Robbins

quotes.message: Frustration is the wet nurse of violence.
quotes.name: David Abrahansen

quotes.message: Buddha's doctrine: Man suffers because of his craving to possess and keep forever things which are essentially impermanent... this frustration of the desire to possess is the immediate cause of suffering.
quotes.name: Alan Watts

quotes.message: It's a lack of clarity that creates chaos and frustration. Those emotions are poison to any living goal.
quotes.name: Steve Maraboli

quotes.message: All successful people learn that success is buried on the other side of frustration.
quotes.name: Tony Robbins

quotes.message: Frustration is the first step toward improvement...It's only when I face frustration and use it to fuel my dedication that I feel myself moving forward.
quotes.name: John Bingham

quotes.message: Is there no way out of the mind.
quotes.name: Sylvia Plath

quotes.message: At one point he decided enough was enough.
quotes.name: Steven Wright

quotes.message: But better die than live mechanically a life that is a repetition of repetitions.
quotes.name: D. H. Lawrence

quotes.message: Every thought derives from a thwarted sensation.
quotes.name: E. M. Cioran

quotes.message: It is the awareness of unfulfilled desires which gives a nation the feeling that it has a mission and a destiny.
quotes.name: Eric Hoffer

quotes.message: The torment of human frustration, whatever its immediate cause, is the knowledge that the self is in prison, its vital force and ''mangled mind'' leaking away in lonely, wasteful self-conflict.
quotes.name: Elizabeth Drew

quotes.message: People need trouble -- a little frustration to sharpen the spirit on, toughen it.
quotes.name: William Faulkner

quotes.message: All that is necessary to break the spell of inertia and frustration is to -- act as if it were impossible to fail.
quotes.name: Dorothea Brande

quotes.message: Frustration is an indication of lack of faith and trust in the Lord.
quotes.name: Psalm 119:165

quotes.message: Frustration is a very positive sign. It means that the solution to your problem is within range, but what you're currently doing isn't working, and you need to change your approach in order to achieve your goal.
quotes.name: Anthony Robbins

quotes.message: Motivation without mobilization means only frustration
quotes.name: Nido Qubein

quotes.message: Expectation is the mother of all frustration
quotes.name: Antonio Banderas

quotes.message: Frustration, although quite painful at times, is a very positive and essential part of success
quotes.name: Bo Bennett
